Params: {1: 'Dear Stranger:', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'I know you might be confused seeing this in your mailbox.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "If you're too busy with work and have no time for stuff like this, feel free to toss this letter into the trash.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'But if you do happen to have some free time or are looking for a way to kill time, please consider flipping over to page two.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: 'On a random day, you receive a letter from a stranger in your personal mailbox.'}
{3: "Most people in this day and age wouldn't send handwritten letters unless it was a confidential document. For one, it's a waste of resources, and for another, it's not instantaneous."}
{3: "But this letter clearly isn't of the confidential sort."}
{3: 'The royal blue ink, the soft, smooth sheet, the elegant cursive letters, and the faint woody scent of powder...'}
{3: 'is all too exquisite and meticulous, almost as if it were a message from another world.'}
{3: 'Letters have almost been completely replaced by comms in this era. A formal letter like this is exceedingly rare, and only glimpsed in movies filmed in the previous century.'}
{3: 'Who would use such an antiquated way of communication?'}
{3: 'Feeling confused, you slowly flip over to the next page.'}
{1: "I'm glad you're reading this line. This means this letter hasn't ended up crushed in the trash can.", 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Please don't get me wrong. This is not a prank.", 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Truth be told, I\'m looking for a "pen pal".', 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: '<para\\>I\'m not sure if you know what a "pen pal" is.<para\\>I only learned of it recently when I saw it in a book from the Center of Basic Public Education\'s library.', 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Basically, pen pals build a friendship by writing letters to each other.', 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'People say that, a long time ago, before the information age arrived, people would write letters to communicate across vast distances.', 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Perhaps you might think that such an inefficient and costly way of communicating is tedious and a waste of time.', 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'But when I saw this method, it just seemed so...', 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{3: 'The next word was crossed out several times, and it was obvious that the writer was weighing their words over and over.'}
{1: 'Romantic.', 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Romantic. Yes, that's right, it's the type of romance that we lack in this era.", 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'An era in which everyone is always in a hurry, in pursuit of maximum levels of efficiency.', 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'The act of finding stillness and putting your thoughts on paper is simply inconceivable.', 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "There are even times when I feel that the written word is better than spoken language when it comes to expressing what's deep in your heart.", 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'No matter where I am, things like good etiquette and upbringing... weigh heavily on my shoulders, smothering me.', 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "It's only when I'm writing that I can cast off those shackles and be myself.", 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "The words I can never speak, the feelings inside I can't say out loud... the written word will say what my voice can't.", 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "What's more, I won't have to deal with the immediate reaction from others, nor will I feel ashamed of the unseemliness of my actions.", 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'I can write whatever I want on paper and the words that appear on the page reflect who I am inside.', 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'I seem to be blabbering. Forgive me for being so immature as to get overexcited and let my emotions get the better of me over such a small matter.', 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Anyway, since you've read up to this point, you should already have guessed.", 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 8: '1'}
{1: 'I would like you, a stranger, to be my pen pal.', 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: '<para\\>At first, I was thinking of trying out this method of communication with my friends, <para\\>but I came to realize that it was too deliberate, making it more awkward than it should be.', 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "So I started contemplating sending this letter to a random address in Eden, to a stranger I've never met.", 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "I don't need to know who you are. Neither do you need to know who I am.", 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'All we have to do is use this antiquated but simple method of communication to slowly get to know each other.', 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "Let me briefly introduce myself. I'm Iris and as you've probably guessed, this is not my real name, but rather, a pen name.", 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "Well, that's enough about me. After all, you might not want to know everything about a stranger's life all at once.", 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Perhaps we can talk about our hobbies in our next letter and share what we're passionate about.", 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "I've attached a return envelope and a blank sheet of paper with this letter. I hope to hear from you.", 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "If you're too busy with work, don't worry about it. This shouldn't be an onerous process.", 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "All you have to do is to write your thoughts on the subject down. I'll be really happy with just that.", 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Yours faithfully,', 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Iris', 2: '0000ffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{3: 'The envelope contains a folded envelope and letter.'}
{3: 'For some reason, you decide to sit before your desk.'}
{2: '(Pick up a pen and write a response)', 3: '57'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory57.jpg'}
{3: 'From the other end of Babylonia.'}
{3: 'The young girl is pacing around the room with a letter grasped tightly in her hand.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selena', 3: 'Someone actually replied...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She suddenly throws herself onto her bed, burying her face in the pillow.'}
{3: 'After quite some time, she finally looks up in the dim light and peeks at the letter in her hands.'}
{3: 'As if it were a real person and not just an object.'}
{3: "She didn't actually have high hopes of receiving a reply when she sent the letter."}
{3: "That's why she's completely overjoyed right now, to the point of blushing."}
{3: "Taking a deep breath, Selena gently opens the letter, and couldn't help averting her gaze for a moment."}
{3: 'After calming herself down, she covers her eyes and peeks through the gaps between her fingers at the letter paper spread out on the bed.'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: '"Hello, thank you for your letter. My name is 【kuroname】…"', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She reads every word aloud.'}
{3: 'And softly repeats the name in the signature.'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: '【kuroname】.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A gentle smile quietly blossoms on her face.'}
